Package Assember.Utils.DataTypes

Class WordData

java.lang.Object
Assember.Utils.DataTypes.DataDeclaration
Assember.Utils.DataTypes.WordData
public class WordData extends DataDeclaration
Class representing a word data declaration in the assembly code. Extends the DataDeclaration abstract class.
